library.name: GFX
library.description: Drawing and image-loading functions designed to be used with the Game library.

enum.name: ImageLoaderStatus
enum.description: Enum for various states an ImageLoader can be in.

function.name: fromResource
function.arg: Path to a bundled image resource.
function.description: Creates an image loader instance for an image resource that was bundled with the project.

function.name: fromWeb
function.arg: URL to an image.
function.description: Creates an image loader instance for an image file from the web. Note that bundled image resource should still be loaded with fromResource even if the project type is JavaScript.

function.name: fromUserData
function.arg: Path to an image file relative to the user data folder root.
function.description: Creates an image loader instance for an image file in the user data folder.

function.name: fromFile
function.arg: Path to an image file on disk.
function.description: Creates an image loader instance for an image file on the local disk.

function.name: isDone
function.description: Returns a boolean that is true when loading is complete (regardless of error state).

function.name: getImage
function.description: Returns an Image instance. Throws an error if the image is not loaded yet. Use .isDone() and .getStatus() to be sure.

field.name: width
field.description: Width of the image, in pixels.

field.name: height
field.description: Height of the image, in pixels.

function.name: draw
function.arg: X coordinate
Y coordinate
function.description: Draws an image on the GameWindow screen. The top left corner of the image will be position on the given X and Y coordinates.

function.name: ellipse
function.arg: X coordinate of the left side of the ellipse.
Y coordinate of the top side of the ellipse.
Width of the ellipse.
Height of the ellipse.
Red value of the ellipse fill (0-255).
Green value of the ellipse fill (0-255).
Blue value of the ellipse fill (0-255).
Alpha value of the ellipse fill (0-255).
function.description: Draws a filled ellipse on the GameWindow screen.

function.name: line
function.description: Draws a line between the given points with a given width and color.
function.arg: X coordinate of the first point.
Y coordinate of the first point.
X coordinate of the second point.
Y coordinate of the second point.
Width of the line.
Red value of the line color (0-255).
Green value of the line color (0-255).
Blue value of the line color (0-255).
Alpha value of the line color (0-255).

function.name: rectangle
function.description: Draws an axis-aligned filled rectangle at the given coordinates and color.
function.arg: X coordinate of the left side of the rectangle.
Y coordinate of the top side of the rectangle.
Width of the rectangle.
Height of the rectangle.
Red value of the line color (0-255).
Green value of the line color (0-255).
Blue value of the line color (0-255).
Alpha value of the line color (0-255).

function.name: triangle
function.description: Draws an arbitrary triangle with the given fill color.
function.arg: X coordinate of the first point.
Y coordinate of the first point.
X coordinate of the second point.
Y coordinate of the second point.
X coordinate of the third point.
Y coordinate of the third point.
Red value of the line color (0-255).
Green value of the line color (0-255).
Blue value of the line color (0-255).
Alpha value of the line color (0-255).

function.name: fill
function.description: Fills the screen with an opaque color.
function.arg: Red value of the fill (0-255).
Green value of the fill (0-255).
Blue value of the fill (0-255).
